name: Cephalopod Suckers
effect: Hands covered in suckers, never drops weapons unless by choice. -3 to thrown weapons

name: Large Fangs
effect: Gains 1D4 Bite attack but -1 to Presence tests

name: Unnatural Metabolism
effect: As action heal 1D4 to self, but eats any Resources found (loses Resource rewards)

name: Evertible Stomach
effect: As action can remove Poisoned status by everting stomach

name: Iridescent Blue Skin
effect: Skin turns blue, no mechanical effect

name: Distorted Vocal Cords
effect: Can no longer read Manuscripts. As action can growl to intimidate within 3 inches

name: Enhanced Reflexes
effect: +1 Agility but must make Presence test to avoid attacking nearest model

name: Thick Hide
effect: +1 Armor Value but -1 to social interactions

name: Night Vision
effect: Ignores Darkness penalties but -2 to tests in bright light

name: Elongated Limbs
effect: +2 inches reach for melee attacks but -1 Agility

name: Acid Blood
effect: When wounded, attacker takes 1 damage if in melee range

name: Multiple Eyes
effect: +2 to spotting hidden enemies but -1 Presence

name: Webbed Digits
effect: +3 to swimming tests but -1 to fine manipulation

name: Chitinous Plates
effect: +1 Armor Value but takes 2 equipment slots worth of space

name: Prehensile Tail
effect: Can manipulate one additional item but takes extra equipment slot

name: Bioluminescence
effect: Glows in dark, cannot hide but provides light

name: Regeneration
effect: Heal 1 HP per Scenario but must consume extra food (2R cost)

name: Toxic Secretions
effect: Unarmed attacks cause Poisoned but cannot use medical items on others

name: Psychic Sensitivity
effect: Can sense Hostiles within 12 inches but takes 1 damage in presence of Manuscripts

name: Adaptive Camouflage
effect: +3 to hiding tests but must make Presence test to approach allies
